LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PlanDoors.Label: Plan Doors
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PlanDoors.Desc:
Place planning designations for doors.

Choose from different shapes.

({0}) click to open the color picker. Hold ({0}) to pick an already existing color.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PlanFloors.Label: Plan Floors
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PlanFloors.Desc:
Place planning designations for floors.

Choose from different shapes.

({0}) click to open the color picker. Hold ({0}) to pick an already existing color.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PlanObjects.Label: Plan Objects
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PlanObjects.Desc:
Place planning designations for objects.

Choose from different shapes.

({0}) click to open the color picker. Hold ({0}) to pick an already existing color.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PlanWalls.Label: Plan Walls
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PlanWalls.Desc:
Place planning designations for walls.

Choose from different shapes.

({0}) click to open the color picker. Hold ({0}) to pick an already existing color.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.RemovePlan.Label: Remove Plans
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.CopyPlan.Label: Copy Plan
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.CopyPlan.Desc: Copy a plan of the selected area to the clipboard.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.CutPlan.Label: Cut Plan
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.CutPlan.Desc: Cut a plan of the selected area to the clipboard.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PastePlan.Label: Paste Plan
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PastePlan.Desc: Paste a plan from the clipboard to the map.\n\nUse keys to rotate and flip. (Images for flipping will be replaced later on.)
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.UndoPlan.Label: Undo
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.RedoPlan.Label: Redo
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.TogglePlanVisibility.De: Toggle the visibility of all plans.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PickColorFromPlan: Grab a color from an existing plan.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.UndoRedo.Label: Undo-Redo
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.UseUndoRedo.De: Determines whether to use the undo-redo system and whether the buttons are visible.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.DisplayCutDesi: Determines whether the cut plan designator button is visible.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.DisplayToggleP: Determines whether the toggle plan visibility designator button is visible.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.ArePlansPersis: Determines whether plans stay after a task has been finished on the same cell.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.UseCtrlForColo: Determines whether Ctrl has to be pressed to display the color dialog.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.ArePlansVisibl: Determines whether plan designations are visible or not.
